#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Physical Manipulation
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to handling, modifying, and manipulating objects.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. tirailler (to pull repeatedly)
2. froisser (to crumple, to wrinkle)
3. raccommoder (to mend, to repair)
4. sertir (to set, to mount - as in jewelry)
5. incinérer (to incinerate)
6. séparer (to separate)
7. couper (to cut)
8. plier (to fold)
9. lisser (to smooth)
10. assembler (to assemble)

* Example Sentences

- Il tire sur la corde. (He pulls on the rope.)
- Elle froisse le papier. (She crumples the paper.)
- Je raccommode les vêtements déchirés. (I mend torn clothes.)
- Le bijoutier sertit les diamants dans l'or. (The jeweler sets the diamonds in gold.)
- Nous plions les serviettes. (We fold the napkins.)

* Conjugation Drills

** froisser

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je        |            |
| tu        |            |
| il/elle   |            |
| nous      |            |
| vous      |            |
| ils/elles |            |
